member.name: T:ChirpDBContext
member.summary: The EF Core database context used by the app.
member.remarks: It exposes the DbSet properties for your entities (Authors and Cheeps) and wires up ASP.NET Identity for authors.

member.name: M:ChirpDBContext.#ctor(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbContextOptions)
member.summary: Create the context with the given EF options.
member.param: EF Core options used to configure the context.

member.name: P:ChirpDBContext.Authors
member.value: Represents the Authors table in the database.

member.name: P:ChirpDBContext.Cheeps
member.value: Represents the Cheeps table in the database.
